*Names of children as recorded by the US Social Security Administration.*
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
Jose<-BabyNames %>%  filter(name=='Jose')  

Jose   %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=year,y=count))  + geom_point(aes(color=sex)) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 1996)
```
<!-- Don't edit the material above this line -->

Name Trend for Jose

As you can see, there was a heavy influx in the number of Jose's born in the 90s and 00s,
peaking at around 2002. There has been a steady decline in the number of Joses born as of late.
